response.overview: LUANA (23) works at a daycare and lives with her mother, longing to escape her sheltered life. When her cousin DOMI (27) invites her to his black-metal band WLVS’s rehearsal, she’s drawn to the music—and to the enigmatic new Polish singer, WIKTOR (31). Intimidated but intrigued, Luana impulsively joins the band on tour, facing tough conditions and proving herself through her work on social media and merchandising. In the heart of the underground music scene, Luana’s relationship with Wiktor leads to a turbulent journey of discovery, blurring the line between freedom and fanaticism.
response.title: Wolves
